description:
Go farther, climb higher and ski better. Stiff but flexible, the Backland Pro Boots are in their natural habitat on fast ascents and faster descents. With an incredible 74 degrees of mobility, skinning and bootpacking isn't a sufferfest. The liners are insulated and sculpted for female feet, offering you a performance-engineered boot for ambitious ski days, tours and whatever falls in between.

  • Prolite construction in the shell and cuff provides support and power transmission
  • Memory Fit heating technology for a fully personalized shell, cuff, and liner
  • Energy backbone reinforcements provides extra power and edge grip
  • 3D Gold liner offers out of the box fit and features an Achilles Flex Zone for uphill mobility
  • Liner support zones in calf, ankle and tongue improve downhill performance
  • Free/Lock 4.0 mechanism allows 74-degree range of motion for walking
  • Frictionless pivot uses polymer bushings to move naturally in walk mode
  • Cross Lace 2.0 closure system wraps and holds your foot securely
  • Rockered rubber sole allows for nearly normal walking
name: Atomic Backland Pro - Women's
